name: Gemini 2.5 Pro Preview (May 6, I/O Edition)
description: May 2025 I/O Edition preview of Gemini 2.5 Pro with significant improvements to code generation and function calling. Announced at Google I/O 2025 with enhanced coding performance.
notes: Preview model released May 6, 2025 (I/O Edition). Major improvements to coding and function calling over 03-25 version. The 03-25 version automatically redirects to this model.
